A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very dissapointing. Opening sequence was great but it started falling apart after that. I liked some of the prequels better than this and those were at the bottom of my list for Star Wars movies. Visually there were a lot of cool things going on but the story just wasn't very good and at the end nothing really advanced with the characters and you know no more than what you did at the end of episode 7 and it makes the movie pointless in a lot of ways. It is going to be hard to salvage things with episode 9 after that mess.
